mapper.select:
select id, CommunityId as community_id, UserId as user_id, ArrivalTime as arrival_time, state as state, position as position, communitymemberscol as communitymemberscol, CreateDate as create_date, UpdateDate as update_date, CreateUser as create_user, UpdateUser as update_user from communitymembers
where ${ew.sqlSegment}
